mita wasarakata pamana ihatha di aluthgama chinawaththa pradeshaye di niwasak idiripita di wyaparikayakuta wedi thaba barapathala thuwala sidukara palagos sangawi siti pudgalayan dedena athadanguwata gath bawa kaluthara wishesha aparadha wimarshana anshaya kiyayi.wedi thabima meheya wu bawa kiyana pradhana sakakaru aluthgama darga nagaraye randi sitiyadi athadanguwata gena prashna kirime di wedi thabima sidu kala pudgalaya piliyandala di athadanguwata gath bawa polisiya kiyayi.barapathala thuwala labu wyaparikaya aluthgama pradeshaye idamak wikuna laba gath mudala laba ganime aramunin wedi thaba ohuwa ghathanaya kirimata athadanguwata gath pradhana sakakaruge balaporoththuwa wu bawa ohugen prashna kirime di heliwi yayi polisiya kiyayi.mema siddhiyen wasan wi sitima sandaha pradhana sakakaru wyaja gaman balapathrayak upayogi karagena widesha gathawimata uthsaha kara guwan thotupala niladharinta hasuwimen anathuruwa pas masaka kalayak rakshitha bandhanagara gathawi danduwam labu ayeku bawa polisiya kiyayi.pradhana sakakarugen widesha rakiyawak laba ganime poronduwa matha mema wedi thabima sidu kala bawa piliyandala di athadanguwata gath sakakaru prakasha kala bawa polisiya kiyayi.wedi thabimata upayogi kara gath gini awiya, yathuru padiya soya ganima sandaha pradhana sakakaruwa randawa ganime niyoga laba ganimata niyamithawa athayi polisiya kiyayi.kaluthara kottasa bhara polis adhikari lalith pathinayaka mahathage adhikshanaya yatathe kaluthara wishesha aparadha wimarshana anshaye sthanadhipathi saman padmalal mahathage upades matha polis sarayan (55202) wirasena, (17668) jayantha (26019) dayasena (4492) gunawardhana polis kosthapal (54582) prasad (50880) munasinha (82114) wijenayaka mahathwaru parikshana pawathwathi..

kesewethath 2000 dashakaye mul bhagayedi mema yuda tankiya redi walin aawaranaya kara thibena awasthawaka labagath chayarupa madhya wetha labi thibini.yuda wisheshagnyayo ema chayarupa wishleshanaya kara yuda tankiye,bara,usa,diga palala aadi samahara daththa aasanna washayen gananaya karana ladi.ehi pradhana awiya mi.mi. 120 rayinmetal smuth bor wargaye ekak bawa owun kiya.kesewethath mema dakunu koriyanu yuda tankiye ilektronik paddhathin,sanniwedana upanga saha sakriya aarakshaka upaya marga saha thawath thakshanika daththa(sanyuktha sannahaya)adatath rahasigathaya.
